title: Numerals everywhere
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Mathematics - Study and teaching
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Activity programs in education
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education of children
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Education of children
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Mathematics - Study and teaching
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Education of children
description: Using music and natural sounds, without narration, emphasises numerals in a child's largely urban environment. Car license plates, house numbers, speed limit signs, a petrol pump at the garage, numerals on money, labels on food, a cash register, show that numerals are everywhere. Encourages children to develop an awareness of numerals in their everyday experience.
